item.description:
Part 1 of 6 in Wicca Training Series

Event Details: This is the first introductory class, in the series of (6) classes of training towards Priest/ Priestesshood.

Class Schedule is as follows:

Classes will be every Saturday from 3:00- 5:30 pm

Classes to begin:

Class l - Sat, . Jan 19th

The difference between Wicca & Witchcraft
Wiccan Glossary
Wiccan Beliefs
Wiccan Rede
3-Fold Law
Pentacle & Pentagram

Class 2 - Sat., Jan 26th

Intro to Wheel of the Year
The Wiccan Way
History of Paganism
The Burning Times
Salem Witch Trials

Class 3 - Sat., Feb 9th

Important Pagan People
Witches Rede of Chivalry
Intro to the (8) Sabbats
The Esbats
The Elements
13 Goals of a Witch
Principles of Pagan Belief

Class 4 - Sat., Feb 16th

The Moon & Her Phases
The God & The Goddess
Pagan Ettiquette
Wiccan Traditions

Class 5 - Sat., March 1st

Rites of Passage
Intro to Gardnerian Wicca
Covens & Degree Systems
Initiation

Class 6 - Sat., March 8th

Intro to Ritual
Book of Shadow/ Grimoires
Numerology/ How to find your Witch Name
Dedication

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

There are (6) classes for each level which is
$15 per class; $90.00 per course, which includes
all paperwork to build your book of shadows.
Each level fills a 1 1/2 notebook binder, to be
provided by the student. Course costs are due
by Saturday, January 19th, and may be paid by
check or paypal.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Each course builds upon the other.

Please note that this will be that last Level 1
class until 2009.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

For more information of all (6) Training courses to
Priest/ Priestesshood, and class content, including
ritual training photos, and student testamonials, see website at the bottom of the page :)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

For more information please email Robin at::

talawolf7@webtv.net

(for quickest response)

Or call:

(508) 847- 7677

Event Location: Edward's Emporium 201- 205 Main St. in Webster
Event TIME Details: 3:00pm- 5:30 pm


UPDATED DIRECTIONS! :)

Rte. 290 South to Rte. 395 South to Webster. Take Exit 2 off 395. At the end of the ramp, take a right onto Rte. 12 (also the same as Rte. 16). Continue on that main road through four sets of lights (make sure at the 3rd light @Webster Credit Union to stay on Rte. 12/16 which goes toward the left). Once you've passed all the fast food places (from BK to KFC to McD's) and finally gone thru the 4th light (only a bit more than a mile in total from the exit), you will pass town hall on your left and the post office on your right, which is the beginning of downtown. Start looking at street numbers and you may see #211 (Commerce Insurance) prominently marked up high on a building on the right--the class is held next door to that building at: Edwards' Emporium which is #201, and also right next door to the Party Planner. (If you get to Dunkin Donuts or the railroad tracks, you've gone too far.)

If you have trouble, call me at:
(508) 847- 7677 I will have my phone with me :)



Website: http:///community.web...
Website II: http://community.webt...
item.why: You will love it because, you will learn things you have never seen in books, and everything you need to know is in one course, in one place, for everything you would need to live a magickal life and practice wicca :)
item.name: Level l Witchcraft Training Class
